sentences.sContent: If you don’t shut up, I’m going to thump you!
sentences.sCn: 你要是不住嘴，我就揍你！

sentences.sContent: She thumped the table with her fist.

synos.tran: 重击；用拳头打；砰地撞到

words.tran: 重击；狠打；怦怦地跳；全力支持（thump的ing形式）

trans.tranCn: 重击；用拳头打；砰地撞到
trans.tranOther: to hit someone very hard with your hand closed
the dull sound that is made when something hits a surface
